remarks: Lemma for ~ paddass .  Remove ` p =/= z ` , ` x =/= y ` , and ` -. r .<_ ( x .\/ y ) ` from antecedent of ~ paddasslem10 , using ~ paddasslem11 , ~ paddasslem12 , and ~ paddasslem13 .  (Contributed by NM, 11-Jan-2012.)
statement:
paddasslem.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
paddasslem.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
paddasslem.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
paddasslem.p $e |- .+ = ( +P ` K ) $.
paddasslem14 $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ ( X C_ A /\ Y C_ A /\ Z C_ A ) /\ ( p e. A /\ r e. A ) ) /\ ( ( x e. X /\ y e. Y /\ z e. Z ) /\ ( p .<_ ( x .\/ r ) /\ r .<_ ( y .\/ z ) ) ) ) -> p e. ( ( X .+ Y ) .+ Z ) ) $.
